Posts.Content: Hi Lellyv Everyone is different some people have worse side effects than others I hadÂ Docetaxel my side effects where faily bad during the second week of each cycle but took about 5 days to kick in and did improved during the 3rd week, I personally had about 7 to 10 days off work during each 3 week cycle. Some people have continued to work through the whole 3 weeks of each cycle. Hope that helps. Gary
Posts.Title: Chemo and working
